name: Google ADK Hotel Search Agent
description: Specializes in finding the best hotel accommodations. Uses Google ADK framework to search, filter, and recommend hotels based on location, budget, and amenities.

skills.name: Hotel Search
skills.description: Search for hotels in a given location with optional filters for budget, rating, and required amenities.
examples: Find hotels in Paris from June 15-22, 2026
Search for 4-star hotels with WiFi and breakfast under $200/night
